comments:
Description:
ClassCastException when preview report with text item and event handler. 

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview attached report which map the text item to attached java class

Expected result:
No errors.

Actual result:
ClassCastException.

Error logs:
java.lang.ClassCastException
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.script.internal.LabelScriptExecutor.getEventHandler(LabelScriptExecutor.java:108)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.script.internal.LabelScriptExecutor.handleOnPageBreak(LabelScriptExecutor.java:96)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.OnPageBreakLayoutPageHandle.onPage(OnPageBreakLayoutPageHandle.java:257)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLPageLM.pageBreakEvent(HTMLPageLM.java:170)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLPageLM.end(HTMLPageLM.java:211)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLPageLM.layout(HTMLPageLM.java:90)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLReportLayoutEngine.layout(HTMLReportLayoutEngine.java:80)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:194)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.tests.engine.EngineCase.runAndRender(EngineCase.java:465)

Possible cause:
TextItemExecutor.executePlainText(IContentEmitter) treats textcontent as instance of LabelContent. It will cause OnPageBreakLayoutPageHandle.onPage(long, Object) calls LabelScriptExecutor.handleOnPageBreak() instead of TextItemScriptExecutor.handleOnPageBreak.
please evaluate the risk of fix this issue in 2.1.1
